Settings.Name: AuthGrantType
Settings.Description: OAuth grant type used to request access token from UiPath Identity Server.

Settings.Name: AuthScope
Settings.Value: OR.Execution.Read OR.Folders.Read OR.Jobs.Read OR.Jobs.Write OR.Machines.Read OR.Queues.Read OR.Robots.Read OR.Users OR.Users.Read OR.Administration OR.Administration.Read
Settings.Description: OAuth scopes required for Orchestrator API access.

Settings.Name: OrganizationUnitId
Settings.Description: Orchestrator folder ID used for API requests.

Settings.Name: CompanyName
Settings.Description: Company name for logging and reporting.

Settings.Name: AuthClientSecret
Settings.Description: Credential Asset name for auth secret orchestrator Api

Settings.Name: ApiTriggerToken
Settings.Description: Token used to call orchestrator api trigger only
